item.title: Report X-2024031014
item.description:
Report X-2024031014

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT 20:00 WHILE PERFORMING A HAZMAT AUDIT ON A PACKAGE CAR UPS HAZMAT AUDITOR PULLED AN UN MARKED BOX AND OPENED THE PACKING SLIP LOCATED ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX. SHE THEN LOOKED UP THE SDS FOR THE PRODUCT LISTED ON THE PACKING SLIP AND NOTICED IT SAID THE ITEM WAS REGULATED FOR TRANSPORTATION. SHE THEN CALLED THE HAZMAT SUPPORT CENTER WHO INSTRUCTED HER TO OPEN THE BOX TO CONFIRM THE CONTENTS. THE CONTENTS WERE CONFIRMED AND THE HAZMAT SUPPORT CENTER SAID THE BOX WAS A SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT AND TO GIVE IT TO A DESIGNATED RESPONDER.

item.title: Report X-2024030622
item.description:
Report X-2024030622

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-20T15:11:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE NOTICED A WET BOX ON THE SMALL SORT'S DEBAG SLIDE AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR WHO PLACED THE BOX IN A TOTE AND TOOK THE TOTE TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. THE RESPONDER THEN TOOK THE TOTE AND BEGIN PROCESSING THE LEAKING PACKAGE. DURING CLEAN UP AND INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
